meanings.definition: The branch of science that deals with the origin of the universe.
meanings.sent1: In cosmogonies, scientists explore how the universe began.
meanings.sent2: Many scientists dedicate their careers to studying cosmogonies.
meanings.sent3: The class on cosmogonies was so fascinating that even the sleepy students perked up.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with cosmogonies was like a never-ending journey into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The mysteries of cosmogonies unfolded before their curious eyes.

meanings.definition: The study of the origin and development of the universe or of a particular system of beliefs.
meanings.sent1: Cosmogonies help us understand how different beliefs about the universe developed.
meanings.sent2: Ancient civilizations had their own cosmogonies to explain the world around them.
meanings.sent3: The debate about cosmogonies among the scholars turned into a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: Her interest in cosmogonies was like peeling back layers of history to reveal the truth.
meanings.sent5: Through cosmogonies, we glimpse the ancient stories of creation.
